text: 15.52: Sek 9.14; Mt 24.31; 1 Te 4.16Mba tɨv, mba mpuur mbarɨp sɨmɨra tharga, nzan fhavi harigi khesharav hegɨrga. Ahaŋ, mba mbarɨv sɨmɨnga, mba vhɨzgi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe taagip khavɨrga, mben fhavi wom mbarɨgɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Nza kha vhɨzgi fhuv gumgi, nza vhɨra nzan rɨmgi vhɨra khuasegi farar muuŋgip, nza zam, nzan fhavi harigi khesharav hegɨrga.
